segments.text: I see the water just overflowing, and it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware of the mess she’s in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn her before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so slippery, and someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or if she’s really this distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, and it’s making me so stressed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, even though I know it’s going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the water before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
